description: Gilmar sells a 410-meter independent villa on a 586-meter plot in the magnificent Monte Real urbanization with magnificent views of the mountains. It has a solar panel to help the electric hot water heater.For heating it has a 1000 liter diesel tank.In addition, it has a fireplace and air vents in several bedrooms. DISTRIBUTION: MAIN FLOOR: Separate kitchen, living room with access to the terrace and garden (option to make a bedroom on the ground floor), bathroom and patio. FIRST FLOOR: 3 bedrooms that share 2 bathrooms (they share a bathtub and can be separated again), one of the bedrooms has a terrace facing south. ATTIC: There is a mattress to be used as a guest bedroom if desired, access is with a retractable ladder and one of the walls is open to one of the bedrooms. BASEMENT: 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 separate kitchen and living room.(It is currently rented, it has its own independent entrance to the plot.They can stay or go, whatever the buyer decides) If you are interested in this house, do not hesitate to contact us, we will gladly assist you, we will explain in detail all the information you need and if you wish you can visit it without obligation. WE DO NOT CHARGE BUYER FEES! AND WE GET THE MAXIMUM FINANCING WITH THE BEST CONDITIONS AT NO COST TO THE BUYER! IF YOU WANT TO SELL YOUR HOUSE… CALL US. At GILMAR we work to offer our clients the best properties, with specialized teams in each area to provide them with the best option for their needs, with all the excellence and taking maximum care of the details. In more than 35 years of activity, Gilmar has managed to reach a privileged space within the high standing Real Estate Sector.We cover all real estate needs: homes, offices, commercial premises, plots, rustic land, land to build. Our clients have the necessary advice from the beginning, to guarantee their security, legal effectiveness and the best financial-fiscal profitability. Great opportunity to get your home tailored to your dreams. Houses in Torrelodones, houses in Villalba, houses in Alpedrete, houses in Moralzarzal, houses in Becerril, houses in Navacerrada, houses in Guadarrama, houses in Los Molinos, houses in El Escorial, houses in Cercedilla, houses in Galapagar, houses in the Sierra , buy a house, buy a flat, buy a house, buy a chalet, buy an attic.

Do you want to enjoy a beautiful and exclusive detached house, renovated with the highest qualities to move into and in a spectacular environment? This house is special for its constructive qualities, its beautiful views of the Madrid mountains, and the natural environment where it is located.Built in 1.970 but completely renovated consists of a 1408 m2 plot, with covered outdoor parking for three cars, solarium, a large gazebo to enjoy and 2 ZEN water fountains. The house is distributed as follows: Main floor: Large living room with central fireplace, very bright kitchen with Santos signature furniture with office, Neff and Liebherr appliances.Two large bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms (main with fireplace and large dressing room) and a guest toilet. Ground floor: A recreation room with billiards and fireplace, office with fireplace, guest toilet and a third bedroom with a bathroom en suite. Spa area with gym and Turkish bath with chromotherapy Indoor pool: A beautiful indoor summer and winter pool where you can enjoy all year round.It has a countercurrent jet to swim whatever you want from the OSPA brand, its 8x4 meters in overflowing stainless steel, automated thermal curtain, 2 hydromassage beds, 3 gooseneck jets. Fitness area, shower, Hamman.It has a large room to change and a room where all the machinery of the house is perfectly placed to be able to carry out its revisions without any difficulty. Qualities: hot / cold underfloor heating and sanitary hot water through Geothermal Energy System, auxiliary air conditioning, hot / cold with heat pumps on the first floor, PVC walnut exterior carpentry, WERU secured windows, chestnut solid wood interior carpentry, 1st floor floor with laminate flooring and Porcelanosa bathrooms, Bose AUDIO / VIDEO and Domotics. This beautiful home is located in the Sotosierra de Soto del Real urbanization, with 24-hour security service, social club with sports facilities, restaurant, activities, etc.Next to schools, supermarkets, ambulatory and downtown with all kinds of services. Located 42 km by highway from the city of Madrid, 11 km from Colmenar Viejo and close to other towns such as Manzanares el Real, Guadalix de la Sierra, Miraflores de la Sierra and the spectacular Pedriza. Soto del Real is a population of 8,500 inhabitants and is located in a privileged natural environment in the Sierra de Madrid, on the southern slope of the Sierra de Guadarrama.The third part of its surface is within the Regional Park of the Cuenca Alta del Manzanares.The location of Soto del Real is ideal to enjoy nature and multiple outdoor activities." We do not charge fees to buyers.

The remaining plot of 138 m2 with different shaded areas to enjoy outdoors with absolute privacy with a vehicle entrance and a small tool room. It is located on a quiet street, but at the same time very close to all services and very well connected to public transport due to its frequency with several lines. The town, located 45 km from Madrid and very close to Colmenar Viejo, is located on the southern side of the Sierra de Guadarrama. It is one of the municipalities with the highest demand in the entire area, due to the quality of life it offers to its inhabitants. COME AND MEET HIM! You will not regret.

Enrique Vallinas Lázaro Pablo Batres Independent housing close to the town center, with easy access to schools, institutes, supermarkets and other services. Traditional construction house arranged in semi-stories MAIN FLOOR SOTO DEL REAL Population in constant evolution, with rising prices with the upcoming arrival of the commuter train to the town, which will provide it with better communication with the capital. Soto del Real, former Chozas de la Sierra town, is a Spanish municipality in the province and Community of Madrid. It is located on the south face of the Guadarrama mountain range, more specifically in the area known as Cuerda Larga. The valley closest to the municipality is Hoya de San Blas. It is located 46 km by road from the city of Madrid and 11 km from Colmenar Viejo. Soto del Real has 6 bus lines, four of them having their head at the Plaza de Castilla Interchange: - Line SE720: Colmenar Viejo - Manzanares el Real - Line 720: Colmenar Viejo (FFCC) - Collado Villalba - Line 721: Madrid (Plaza de Castilla)-Colmenar Viejo - Line 724 (outskirts of the municipality): Madrid (Plaza de Castilla) - Manzanares el Real - El Boalo - Line 725: Madrid (Plaza de Castilla) - Miraflores - Bustarviejo – Valdemanco - Line 726: Madrid (Plaza de Castilla) - Guadalix – Navalafuente In Soto del Real there are four daycare centers (one public and three private), two public preschool and primary schools, and one secondary education institute. Soto del Real has a public institute that provides secondary and high school and a Catholic charter school, which has infant, primary, secondary, high school and intermediate and higher vocational training. For more information or to arrange a visit, please contact us. Enrique Vallinas Lázaro Pablo Batres B2V InmobiliariA, real estate services in the mountains of Madrid and surroundings. Because we take our mission very seriously, we only work EXCLUSIVELY.

Magnificent Chalet in Soto del Real Magnificent villa located in a privileged enclave of the northern mountain range of Madrid. The house is distributed so that the accesses to the different rooms are comfortable and pleasant, with few steps between one floor and another. The entrance gives a spacious hall, and we have two splendid bedrooms on both sides with their respective bathrooms en suite. We go down a few steps and enter the noble area of the chalet, with a splendid living room with fireplace and terrace. Also the kitchen is very comfortable and spacious. On the first floor are the master bedroom with its large dressing room and a magnificent office. A few steps up are the other two bedrooms with their bathroom. In the attic area, with ceilings of an extraordinary height, there is enough space for three more bedrooms. The plot that surrounds the chalet, has very nice and well differentiated facilities. We have a large terrace of 200 m2 for celebrations and leisure, with its barbecue and built-in kitchen with its bar and tables. In another area of the plot is located the semi-covered and heated pool, with its bathroom with jacuzzi in the same area. It also has a large playground with a pediment, to enjoy outdoor sports. The windows of the house are all double climalit with a perfect conservation of heat in winters and freshness in summer. It is a very comfortable home with all the equipment to enjoy it all year as a main home or, of course, as a second home or investment. Soto del Real is located on the south face of the Sierra de Guadarrama, more specifically in the area known as Cuerda Larga. Most of the municipality is within the Regional Park of the Cuenca Alta del Manzanares and therefore protected. In 1960 the municipality of Chozas de la Sierra changed its name to the current one, Soto del Real. In the last decades it has had an impressive urban development that has taken it from having 421 inhabitants in 1960 to about 8,000 current ones. This urban development has been based on urbanizations. These in their beginning were colonies of low houses and squared plot. Later the model changed to massive housing developments, which make up the majority urban landscape in this town. The construction of blocks of flats has been minority, and largely at the expense of the old houses of the town, of which there are only a few examples. In 1998 the center of the town was remodeled, creating a new town hall and a new town square completely pedestrian. The municipal sports center with indoor pool, gymnasium and tennis courts was also inaugurated. In recent years, the Arroyo del Valle viaduct has been built as part of the Madrid-Valladolid line of the AVE. The communication with Madrid is excellent with buses every ten minutes and the suburban train station is approved for the near future. The town has all the services, a 24-hour health center, public and private schools, sports facilities, etc.

Semi-detached house in Soto del Real E&V presents this villa in the historic center in magnificent condition. It is located in a privileged area, just 80 meters from the Plaza del Ayuntamiento de Soto del Real. Very good views of the mountains of Madrid. The villa is fenced for privacy, with an interior garden surrounding the entire property. It is ideal for families and professionals in the area. The house is designed for low consumption, with a kitchen in good condition, gas installation, and PVC carpentry with special double glazing. Living room, kitchen, toilet and porch on the first floor, has three bedrooms, one with balcony, and bathroom, upstairs. It has a front and back garden. The villa is accessed by a terrace from which leads to the first floor where we find a toilet and a spacious living room with two rooms and fireplace, kitchen with access to the garden, furnished with high and low furniture, equipped, and recently changed the electrical installation and plumbing. The upper floor has three bedrooms, a bathroom with bathtub with dressed sink, all with fitted closets, two of them doubles and one single, the main one has a corner terrace. It has renovated windows and kitchen exit door in white lacquered aluminum climalit with thermal break tilt and turn windows, cast iron bars. It also has gas central heating. The garden is 138 m2 with shaded areas, with an absolute privacy and with an entrance for vehicles and a small tool room. Soto del Real is located 46 km from Madrid and 11 km from Colmenar Viejo and is close to other towns such as Manzanares el Real, Guadalix de la Sierra, Miraflores de la Sierra and the spectacular Pedriza. Soto del Real is a town of 8,500 inhabitants and is located in a privileged natural environment of the Sierra de Madrid, on the southern slope of the Sierra de Guadarrama. A third of its surface is within the Cuenca Alta del Manzanares Regional Park and is ideal for enjoying nature and multiple outdoor activities. It is communicated with the capital by the M-607 road and Renfe commuter trains from Colmenar Viejo, for which it has a shuttle bus line that communicates directly with its station. It also has several bus lines with destination in the Plaza de Castilla interchange.

Magnificent independent villa in Soto del Real Engel & Völkers offers you this exclusive and luxurious independent Villa in Soto del Real, in the consolidated Sotosierra urbanization; one of the best in the town. The property is located in a privileged place with spectacular and wide views while preserving a unique privacy and intimacy. Its traditional construction, on a plot of 1,169 meters, with excellent Qualities give it a sober and welcoming appearance and the quantity and breadth of its windows give it an extraordinary luminosity. It is distributed over 3 floors: The main floor has a spacious living-dining room, from which there is access to a spacious terrace, kitchen, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms; one of them en suite. From the entrance hall you access the upper floor with sloping ceilings and the lower floor. The upper floor, with sloping ceilings and finished in thermochip, offers 3 large multipurpose rooms that can be used as studios and / or bedrooms. On the lower floor is the garage with capacity for two cars, the boiler and the fuel tank. It also has a cellar and 2 large multipurpose rooms. The house is heated by underfloor heating fed by a gas-oil boiler. In the garden, there is a magnificent pool of about 50 square meters. Property located in the Sotosierra urbanization, one of the best urbanizations in Soto del Real, close to schools, supermarkets and the center of the urban area with all kinds of services. The urbanization has a 24-hour security service, pruning and garbage collection and a social club with sports facilities and a restaurant. Soto del Real is located 46 km from Madrid and 11 km from Colmenar Viejo and is close to other towns such as Manzanares el Real, Guadalix de la Sierra, Miraflores de la Sierra and the spectacular Pedriza. Soto del Real is a population of 8,500 inhabitants and is located in a privileged natural environment in the Sierra de Madrid, on the southern slope of the Sierra de Guadarrama. The third part of its surface is within the Regional Park of the Cuenca Alta del Manzanares and is ideal to enjoy nature and multiple outdoor activities. It communicates with the capital by the M-607 road and the RENFE from Colmenar Viejo, for which it has a shuttle bus line that communicates directly with its station. It also has several bus lines bound for the Plaza de Castilla interchange.

Large plot of 1,096m2 with several green areas and consolidated vegetation. South facing house. Pool area with gazebo and wooden shed for pool items. Porch under the house with work benches and large terrace. Land with fruit trees. Lots of privacy thanks to the vegetation and the garden walls. Villa for sale in Soto del Real, in the urbanization of "Los Rancajales", a very quiet area with spectacular views of the Sierra de Madrid and a few minutes from the urban center. The house stands on a completely flat plot of 1.000 m2 approx. and the garden has a paddle tennis court, heated pool, solar panels and light at night. It also has an extensive lawn with more than enough space for the little ones to play or any pets we might have. The garden has automatic irrigation fed by a cistern with which we also fill the pool, which represents a great saving in water. We also have a porch with a glass curtain that can be placed or removed according to weather needs and that communicates with the kitchen and the living room. The house is built in two heights: Main floor Large living room with direct access to the porch and kitchen that also communicates with the garden. Three spacious rooms, one of them has a private bathroom. All rooms have fitted wardrobes and we have another bathroom that serves the rest of the floor. Low level On this floor we have a large garage with capacity for 3 cars with an automatic motorized door. The garage communicates with the main floor through the cellar or leisure area. On this same floor there is a large open room that is currently used as a cellar, celebrations or family gatherings, this space is soundproofed so as not to disturb the neighbors. It has a bar, very useful for those celebrations. From it we can access the upper floor. On this floor we have a room that could well be a bedroom or an office, a bathroom and a small storage room. The house is heated with natural gas and the windows are climalit. The urbanization has playgrounds and green areas for the use and enjoyment of the residents. It is a very quiet area with easy access to the M-608 and the M-607 via the Remedios road. We offer financial advice. Call me to arrange a visit Enrique Vallinas Lazaro  B2V quality real estate services.

For sale independent villa of 264 m2, in VISTARREAL urbanization, distributed on two floors, on a plot of 581 m2. MAIN FLOOR: - Direct access to the house, at the same ground level, both through the main entrance and through any of the two porches. - Entering through the main door, we find a spacious hall with a built-in wardrobe, which gives access to a 41 m2 room, with 3 rooms consisting of a living room, dining room and an integrated and complete American kitchen. - Communicated at the front with an 11m2 porch and at the rear with another 18m2 with direct access to the garden. - The same floor also has a full bathroom and a multipurpose room; Currently used as a pantry but equipped with everything necessary to be a bedroom, maintaining the versatility of having everything necessary for a home on one floor. - From the outside there is access to the technical room equipped with a 200-liter electric water heater and an aerothermal system that both heats and cools the entire house, through underfloor heating, controlled by independent thermostats, strategically distributed in each room. UPPER FLOOR: - Made up of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, one of them en-suite and the other also equipped with a hydromassage bathtub; laundry room and living room - seating area with fireplace and access to a 10m2 covered terrace with views of the mountains. - Master bedroom with the aforementioned en-suite bathroom and a large 10m2 dressing room with 2 built-in wardrobes, each with 3 sheets, both fully dressed; like the rest of the closets in the remaining bedrooms. - From here, there is access, via a retractable staircase, to the attic area, equipped with pre-installation for future solar panels.Reinforced with thermoacoustic insulation under cover. PARCEL: - Front: ample space, conditioned to park several vehicles and equipped with pre-installation for future electric car charging. - Back: garden area with trees and part tiled. LOCATION: - It is located in the COLONIA VISTARREAL urbanization, an ideal enclave due to its close location to the large common areas with 2 swimming pools (adults and children), basketball and soccer courts, 2 paddle tennis courts and 2 tennis courts. - Direct access to the restaurant from the pool. - Direct exit to the “Anillo Verde” bike lane that surrounds the municipality. - Comfortable access, on foot, to the urban center. - A few meters from the bus stop (725) with destinations Madrid and Miraflores de la Sierra. *It is essential to sign on the visit sheet. **Real estate brokerage fees: 3% plus VAT of the final sale price.

For sale in Soto Del Real is this interesting 100 m2 duplex with no neighbors around and with magnificent views of the Guadarrama mountain range. The floor is distributed as follows: MAIN FLOOR: In it we find a small entrance hall to the house, a good-sized living-dining room (a terrace has been included), a good-sized kitchen, a hallway that gives access to the full bathroom and two bedrooms, one of them large dimensions and balcony. The apartment has a lot of light as it is all exterior, blue heat heating, tile floors, oak interior carpentry, built-in wardrobes in all rooms, aluminum windows with double glazing and double glazing except in the living room. The community expenses are €59.71 and the IBI (contribution receipt) is divided into two payments of approximately €250. Sanitation improvements have been made within it, such as waterproofing and flooring on terrace closets, repair of side finishes, interior gutter and demolition, waterproofing plus flooring on the 24m2 terrace. Soto Del Real has all the necessary services, nurseries, schools and institutes, sports facilities, pharmacy and very good communication with Madrid with approximately 6 bus lines, of which four have their head at the Plaza Castilla interchange.

If you want to live in Soto del Real, on the south side of the Sierra de Guadarrama, surrounded by green areas but only 46 km from Madrid and 11 km from Colmenar Viejo, in a new construction house built with the best qualities and in The only thing left to do is finish the garden and the basement, this is your new home. Its hall welcomes us and leads to a large living room with a kitchen with TopForm brand furniture and Bosch appliances.The open concept makes the space much larger and more practical and has incredible mountain views and direct access to a very pleasant porch where you will enjoy long conversations with family and friends. Its three bedrooms are very spacious, they have a built-in wardrobe area, tilt-and-turn PVC windows with roll-up mosquito nets and double Climalit 4+12+4 Guardian Sun glass.Its two bathrooms are exterior and large, they are fully equipped. The basement has access by stairs from inside the house and independent access from the outside of it.On this floor you have several spaces where you can distribute a second living room, gym area, games, cinema...according to your needs. The thermal and acoustic insulation has an A energy rating.The entire house has 160mm of mineral wool on the outside and 80mm on the partitions.The heating system is underfloor heating/cooling by Ariston 8kW aerothermal, with an independent aerothermal for the DHW. It has a photovoltaic installation of 4.2kWp solar panels on the south roof and a fiber internet network installation throughout the house. All walls in contact with the ground are waterproofed with polyethylene rubber.In the attached plans you can see in more detail the entire project already carried out so that you can enjoy the luxury of opening your new home.Call us now to arrange a visit, you will love it! ** Also rent with option to buy** Beautiful granite masonry house with a privileged location within the Sierra de Guadarrama Natural Park, which allows you to enjoy nature, leisure and gastronomy.Ideal place for lovers of active tourism. Building included in the Madrid Community Heritage catalogue. This small and charming rural hotel with a 550 m² plot, renovated between 2017 and 2018, strategically located within the urban area, consists of three suite-type rooms.Each room is individually designed, with built-in wardrobes, wooden tilt-and-turn windows with superior quality double glazing for greater energy efficiency, and a bathroom, two of the rooms with a hydromassage bathtub and the third with a shower tray.All have TV, Wi-Fi, refrigerator, thermostats to regulate the temperature, heated towel rails in bathrooms, and one of them also has a terrace with views of the garden. On the ground floor, there is an office, a bathroom with two WCs, a fully equipped industrial kitchen (four-burner stove, frittop, electric fryer, cold room/preparation table, dishwasher, small storage room with two freezers and a thermal bridge for serving dishes. to an open room, with complete kitchenware and furniture with capacity for 30 diners. It also has a loft with ample space to be able to use storage. It has a large terrace with lighting, with capacity for 80/100 diners, completely covered with sliding canvas pergolas with nebulizers for summer and closing on three sides of the perimeter for winter.Within the plot there are more buildings attached to the house, with two outside service bars, summer office area, barbecue, warehouse, toilets, etc.It has a new wooden shed for the pellet boiler and the auxiliary gas boiler.The freezer chamber is located in another isolated wooden hut.The wooden kiosk is fully equipped with a camera, freezer, two gas fryers, iron, gas fire, work table and bottle racks. Installations with triphasic light and sound speakers. Prepared for the organization of small events. The house has been a rural hotel and restaurant until March, so it has a license and all the necessary facilities to carry out the activity. Less than 30 minutes from Madrid, with a large parking area in the surroundings.Well connected with buses that communicate with Madrid and surrounding towns. Next opening of a train line that will communicate Soto del Real with the entire commuter network. *Agency fees included in the price.

INDEPENDENT VILLA, WITH POOL, LOCATED IN A PRIVILEGED SITE, WITH VIEWS OF THE SIERRA DE MADRID The house is located in a beautiful town in the north of the Community of Madrid such as Soto del Real, former Villa Chozas de la Sierra, located 42 km from Madrid, on a slope of the Guadarrama mountain range, specifically in the known area like a long rope.It has a lot of trees, a medieval bridge, and a large park called Parque del Río.The closest valley is the San Blas basin.In its proximity we find such emblematic towns as; Miraflores de la Sierra, Guadalix de la Sierra, Colmenar Viejo, Manzanares el Real (mainly famous for its castle and the La Pedriza nature reserve), etc. THE HOUSING AND THE PLOT.The plot has a deeded area of 2,096.88 m2.In 1,999 m2 in cadastre.The garden, with established trees, has a swimming pool, barbecue area (stone), and several charming corners.The Chalet has two floors, located in the highest part of the plot, which gives it, from the main terrace, views where you can see, among others, the Santillana Reservoir, the Manzanares el Real Castle, and the town of La Pedriza. On the GROUND FLOOR we have a porch area, four bedrooms, a living room, a bathroom, a laundry room, a storage room (old cellar), and the garage where the boiler room is located.The UPPER FLOOR can be accessed from several points, inside by a staircase that connects both floors, and from the outside by a staircase on the main façade that leads to the main terrace, and on the side façade from the garden you access the kitchen.From the first floor terrace we access a hall that distributes the living room, kitchen, living room, and the access area to the bedrooms.The bedroom area (seven) has two bathrooms, the third being included in the master bedroom, which also has a dressing room. According to the deeds, the ground floor has an area of approximately one hundred and twenty-seven square meters, and the upper floor has an area of approximately two hundred and fifty-six square meters. QUALITIES and INSTALLATIONS.-Stone and exposed brick façade.Terrazzo and stoneware floors.Walls finished in smooth paint, drop paint, striped depending on the room, tiling in the bathroom and kitchen.Aluminum exterior carpentry, pine wood interior (doors and closet fronts) Heating and A.C.S.(Domestic Hot Water) through individual propane gas installation. ENVIRONMENT AND COMMUNICATIONS.The town has a wide range of small shops and supermarkets, as well as a large selection of restaurants that you cannot miss, where they offer succulent food that you cannot miss. It has a public and private school, as well as daycares, and an institute (IES Sierra de Guadarrama).It also has a health center, pharmacies, cultural center, parish, cultural center, where you can do different activities, etc. It is located 41 km from Madrid, with access via the N-609.It is connected to Madrid and the rest of the surrounding towns through different bus lines; 724 “Madrid (Plaza Castilla) - Manzanares - El Boalo”, 725 “Madrid (Plaza Castilla) - Miraflores - Bustarviejo – Valdemanco”, 726 “Madrid (Plaza Castilla) - Guadaliix – Navalafuente”.From Colmenar we have direct communication with Madrid from the RENFE Cercanías C4 line, with stops at stations such as; “Cantoblanco Universidad”, “Chamartín”, “Nuevos Ministerios”, “Sol”, Atocha”...

This fantastic individual villa consists of a real area of 340m, of which 150m2 is registered, and is located on a 679m2 plot in a private urbanization of Soto del Real, with easy access to the access roads to both the town center like Madrid and nearby towns. The chalet is surrounded by a very well-kept two-level garden, with trees such as pine, olive, magnolia, strawberry tree and cypresses. It has automatic irrigation already installed and has two areas, one with a terrace, another with grass and two areas with stone tables. The façade has arizonica and vines around the perimeter. From the garden we access the main door that takes us to a hall that serves as a distributor for the ground floor that has a toilet, living room, tavern, garage, multipurpose room and broom room. The living room is very spacious and has various spaces for sofas and game tables. It has a large window that gives access to the garden and a fantastic fireplace. The bathroom has a sink and toilet. The multipurpose room can be used as an office, utility room, laundry room, etc. The tavern has a fantastic fully equipped bar, as well as a large wine cellar with Spanish Mudejar-type metal security doors. In front of the tavern, through a large hallway, we access the garage that has space for two cars. If we go up the stairs, we will find a hallway that takes us to a large living room, with access to a large terrace, fireplace and lots of light. We also find three quite spacious bedrooms, and a full bathroom with a bathtub. Of the three bedrooms, the main one has an en-suite bathroom, with a shower and a modern renovation. It also has access to a dressing room with a fully dressed 6-person wardrobe and leads to a balcony with beautiful views of the front garden. The other two bedrooms are doubles, with built-in wardrobes as well. Behind the living room we have the kitchen, with access to the rear garden, it is fully equipped and has access to the rear terrace with beautiful views of the Guadarrama mountain range, a metal grill on the roof and vines. The cladding of the house is made of moss stone and in the tavern there is also some facing of this type of stone. All the interior carpentry is made of walnut panel. The house is completely exterior with windows in all rooms. Be sure to visit this fantastic property in a privileged environment, surrounded by nature and in a town with all the services.
